snippet: Senator Richard G. Lugar, Republican of Indiana, was in Moscow to press for an extension of a program to safeguard and dismantle nuclear and chemical weapons in the former Soviet Union.
abstract: Sen Richard G Lugar of Indiana urges the United States and Russia to team up to eliminate the stockpile of chemical weapons in Syria; Lugar's proposal comes at a time when Russia is steadfastly resisting entreaties to authorize forceful intervention in the Syrian conflict.
lead_paragraph: Senator Richard G. Lugar, Republican of Indiana, was in Moscow to press for an extension of a program to safeguard and dismantle nuclear and chemical weapons in the former Soviet Union.

headline.seo: Lugar Urges U.S. and Russia to Rid Syria of Chemical Weapons
headline.main: Lugar Urges U.S. and Russia to Team Up to Rid Syria of Chemical Weapons
headline.print_headline: Lugar Urges U.S. and Russia to Team Up to Rid Syria of Chemical Weapons
